cameraInstructions.title: Camera permissions denied
cameraInstructions.subTitle: Please allow camera permissions for the app
cameraInstructions.step5: 5: Force quit and reopen the app

forceUpdate.description: Download the latest version of the app for the best experience.
forceUpdate.title: Time for an upgrade!

underConstruction.description: We are sorry for the inconvienience and are working on a fix for this.
underConstruction.title: Under construction!

secretRecoveryPhrase.title: Secret Recovery Phrase
secretRecoveryPhrase.description: This 12-word phrase allows you to recover your wallet and access the assets inside.

caution.title: Do Not Share Your Recovery Phrase!
caution.body: If someone has this secret recovery phrase, they will have full control or your wallet. If you lose it, not even Petra can help you recover it.

caution.title: Do not share your private key!
caution.body: If someone has this key, they will have full control or your wallet. If you lose it, not even Petra can help you recover it.

caution.title: Proceed with caution.
caution.body: Make sure no one is watching your screen before you tap to show your private info.

connectedApps.title: Connected Apps
connectedApps.placeholderBody: Apps connected to your Petra Wallet will show up here.

directTransferToken.title: Receiving NFTs
directTransferToken.label: Automatically Receive NFTs
directTransferToken.description: Let people airdrop NFTs into your wallet. When this setting is off, you need to accept NFTs sent to your address.

toast.toggleOn: Failed to toggle direct transfer on. Please try again.
toast.toggleOff: Failed to toggle direct transfer off. Please try again.

failedToFetchUserOnChainData.label: Not Able to Retrieve Setting
failedToFetchUserOnChainData.body: There is an issue with fetching your on-chain data to determine whether this setting is on or off. Please restart the app and try again.

accountNotFound.label: Account Not Yet Found
accountNotFound.body: Please buy or deposit APT to confirm account on-chain first before opting into automatically receiving NFTs.

fullModal.title: Confirm Transaction
fullModal.infoText: Changing this setting again in the future will incur another network fee.

changePassword.title: Change Password

confirmedNewPasswordNotMatch.subtext: The confirmed new password doesn't match with the new password you entered. Please check your input and try again.

incorrectCurrentPassword.subtext: Current password entered is not correct. Please check your input and try again.

newPasswordNotStrong.subtext: Password has to be at least 9 characters. Please check your input for new password and try again.

changePassword.infoText: You will use this to unlock your wallet.

passwordUpdated.subtext: Your password is updated. You will be redirected to Security & Privacy screen.

removeAccount.message: Although you are removing this from your Petra Wallet, youâ€™ll be able to retrieve it using your recovery phrase or private key.

error.title: Something Went Wrong
error.message: Please try again. If the issue persists, please try updating your app.
